pullRequest.title: FISH-315 Camel Case Testing
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added testing for the camel casing function to make sure that notifier properties are calculated correctly the majority of the time. This is to ensure that notifier implementations don't see any unexpected results.
This PR wasn't necessary, but in implementing new notifiers I was getting anxiety at the sight of this method

beforeCommit.message:
FISH-215 Camel Case Testing

Added testing for the camel casing function to make sure that notifier
properties are calculated correctly the majority of the time. This is to
ensure that notifier implementations don't see any unexpected results.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

nodes.bodyText: Whats expected if there is a number followed by a whitespace and vice versa?

commit.message:
FISH-315 Add Extra Edge Case Tests

Modified the camel case method to fix the extra edge case tests.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-315 Optimise Camel Case Conversion

Exit early if the passed string contains only whitespace or symbols.

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>

FISH-315 Test Non-Alphanumeric String

Signed-off-by: Matthew Gill <matthew.gill@live.co.uk>
